question: Which of the following are the participants of the "Reykjavik Summit, 1986"?
option2: George H. W. Bush and Mikhail Gorbachev
explanation: Ronald Reagan and Mikhail Gorbachev are the participants of the "Reykjavik Summit, 1986". The Reykjavik Summit was a summit meeting between U.S. President Ronald Reagan and General Secretary of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union Mikhail Gorbachev, held in Reykjavik, Iceland, on 11â€“12 October 1986. The talks collapsed at the last minute, but the progress that had been achieved eventually resulted in the 1987 Intermediate-Range Nuclear Forces Treaty between the United States and the Soviet Union.
